states.desc_401: Please log in to view this page
states.desc_403: You do not have permission to view this page. If you believe this to be an error, please contact your leader.
states.desc_404: The page you tried navigating to does not exist.
states.desc_500: The server encountered an unexpected error while handling your request. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
states.desc_timeout: This might mean there was a problem communicating with the server.
states.desc_generic: Something went wrong while handling your request. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact support.
errors.forbidden: You do not have permission to see this content.
errors.upload_start: Something went wrong while trying to upload your image..
errors.download_no_url: There was an error attempting to download this image.
errors.no_url: No url found for this image.
errors.detailed_image: An error occured while trying to get detailed iamge data
errors.cannot_delete: An error occured while trying delete this job.

backend.internal_server_error: The server encountered an unexpected error while handling your request. Please try again later or contact support.
backend.validation_error: There was a problem with the format of the submitted data.
backend.invalid_args: One or more required fields are missing. Please try again or contact support
backend.missing_fields: One or more required fields are missing.
backend.data_integrity_error: The server encountered an unknown error while handling your request. There could have been something wrong with the format of the submitted data, please review and try again. If the problem persists, please try again later or contact support.
backend.invalid_auth_code: Something went wrong during login. Please confirm that both the username and the password is correct. If the problem persists, please try again later or contact support.
backend.refresh_token_error: Your session has expired. Please log in again. If the problem persists, please contact support.
backend.auth_token_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
backend.token_error: Something went wrong with communication with the authorization provider. Please try again or contact support.
backend.missing_auth_token: Unauthorized attempt to access the system. Please log in.
backend.missing_permission: You lack the permissions to perform the request action. If you believe this to be an error, please contact support.

jobs_table.deleted: Deleted job, image, and thumbnail successfully

home.title: ✨ Cogent Labs Emoji upload service ✨
home.jobs_subtitle: It might take a second to process your image into an emoji. Hold on!

jobs.jobs_description: This is a list of jobs to handle the images you have uploaded and generate 100x100px emojis.
jobs.no_jobs_desc: You have not uploaded any emojis yet. Start by going to the home page!
